name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment Consultation - Amiodarone
title: Amiodarone cost per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Amiodarone is used to treat severe cardiac rhythm disorders but also has the potential to cause severe toxicity and side-effects
and must be closely monitored. NICE advise in their guidance for Atrial Fibrillation
that amiodarone should not be used for long-term rate control.
More details can be found on the NHS England website.
